task.title: DITA is a safe and future-proof format
task.shortdesc: DITA is actually designed as a general purpose information interechange format. Structured documents is just one of the things it can currently do. It is proably the most future-proof format you can write documents in, and is a safe format for long-lived documents.

section.title: Documents are usualy only live a few years, but portions can live much longer
